remarks: The mapping extracting the entries of the coefficient matrices of a polynomial over matrices at a fixed position is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 6-Oct-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Dec-2019.)
statement:
mptcoe1matfsupp.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mptcoe1matfsupp.q $e |- Q = ( Poly1 ` A ) $.
mptcoe1matfsupp.l $e |- L = ( Base ` Q ) $.
mptcoe1matfsupp $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ O e. L ) /\ I e. N /\ J e. N ) -> ( k e. NN0 |-> ( I ( ( coe1 ` O ) ` k ) J ) ) finSupp ( 0g ` R ) ) $.
